sentences.en: A defeat like that makes you sit up and think.
sentences.cn: 那样的一次失败会令你警觉起来，开始思考。

sentences.en: After the pain of defeat passes, England have some thinking to do.
sentences.cn: 失败的痛苦过去以后，英国人应该认真反思一下。

sentences.en: Barbara looked increasingly downcast as defeat loomed.
sentences.cn: 当败象已呈时，芭芭拉看上去越来越沮丧。

sentences.en: He gave money to the World Health Organisation to help defeat smallpox.
sentences.cn: 他向世界卫生组织提供资金以帮助消灭天花。

sentences.en: He seems unabashed by his recent defeat.
sentences.cn: 他似乎对最近的失利并不在乎。

sentences.en: Mr Wallace tries to co-opt rather than defeat his critics.
sentences.cn: 华莱士先生竭力拉拢而不是击败他的批评者们。

sentences.en: Political defeat seemed a real possibility at the end of 1981.
sentences.cn: 政治失败在1981年底看来确有可能。

sentences.en: Sampdoria lost their unbeaten record with a 2-1 home defeat against Genoa.
sentences.cn: 桑普多利亚队主场1比2负于热那亚队之后，终止了自己的不败纪录。

sentences.en: She commiserated with the losers on their defeat.
sentences.cn: 她对失败的一方表示同情。

sentences.en: She was a woman who hated to admit defeat.
sentences.cn: 她是个不愿认输的女人。

sentences.en: The defeat of the corporatists is easy to understand.
sentences.cn: 社团主义者的落败不难理解。

sentences.en: The vote is seen as a defeat for the anti-abortion lobby.
sentences.cn: 这一投票结果被看作是反堕胎游说团体的一次失败。

sentences.en: The world champions suffered a sensational defeat.
sentences.cn: 世界冠军遭遇惨败，引起了一片哗然。

sentences.en: The zenith of Perugia'sinfluence came with the defeat of Siena in 1358.
sentences.cn: 1358年击败锡耶纳之后佩鲁贾的影响力达到了顶峰。

sentences.en: They had their championship hopes dashed by a 3-1 defeat.
sentences.cn: 遭遇1比3的失利后，他们的冠军梦就此破灭。

sentences.en: They hoped to defeat the enemy at sea.
sentences.cn: 他们希望在海上击败敌人。

trans.tran_cn: 击败，使困惑，使失败，否决，难倒，失利
trans.tran_en: to win a victory over someone in a war, competition, game etc
to win a victory over someone in a war, competition, game etc
